title: Why has the Best Seller List in the Sunday newspaer been so illegible the past two weeks?  (Last week, it was absolutely unreadable even using a magnifying glass!)  What in the world is the problem???????????
text:
The smaller type is a result of a change by the New York Times, which
supplies the list to the StarNews. Recently the print and e-book lists
were combined, resulting in more information in about the same space.
We receive the list as an image (like a photograph) instead of text,
meaning we can only make the whole list wider and deeper to increase
the size of the print, resulting in lost space on the page. We're
looking into ways to solve this problem.
